title: Anyone else have an animal that can open doors?
body:
I don't know how he does it because if anyone is around or watching he'll meow until they open the door for him.

But when that cat is alone he will open the door. More specifically the door to my room. He doesn't do it for other rooms. Yes it has a round door knob instead of a lever.

It has something to do with how the door to my room doesn't fit the frame right. But none of the other animals (1 other cat and 2 dogs) have opened the door.

Tell me your secrets kitty.
